author: chetanm
msg: OAK-2278 - Make current testcases pass with new index implementation
Ensure that LucenePropertyIndex has the lowest cost

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-2278 - Make current testcases pass with new index implementation

Some test with query like _where [prop] = 1_ were failing because the default Lucene config created for running test did not explicitly define the property type due to which property is treated as string and comparison fails as the index value is long.
As a fix LucenePropertyIndex would try to determine the property type from values specified in PropertyRestriction

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-2272 - Compatibility support for pre index rule configuration

Ensure that regular expression used to allow inclusion of all properties does not allow relative properties. Otherwise such a definition would allow planner to return plan for relative property restrictions like [../foo] which LucenePropertyIndex does not support
